snippet: More attention needs to be paid to understanding just how the shadow banking system got out of control and how to regulate it, because it did stimulate the economy, Floyd Norris writes in his latest column.

headline.main: Norris: The Upside of Reviving Securitizing

abstract: More attention needs to be paid to understanding just how the shadow banking system got out of control and how to regulate it, because it did stimulate the economy, Floyd Norris writes in his latest column.
